home_title: BOOK A WORKPLACE TO WORK ANYWHERE, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT.
home_description: WorkNow is a pioneering platform in Vietnam that connects the demand for workspaces with a convenient network of locations and diverse types of spaces.
pros_1_description: Optimize work performance and productivity by exploring fresh and creative spaces / environments with Worknow.
pros_2_description: Co-working space, Office building, Shopping mall, Caf√©, Hotel,...
pros_3_description: Remote or in-person working solutions for any business in any business sector.
pros_4_description: The cost is affordable and suitable, you will only pay for the utilities that you use.
private_booth_description: Private booth with 1 seat to 4 seats.
flexible_seat_description: Find your desk to work anywhere.
meeting_room_description: Private meeting room with all the amenities you need.
event_hall_description: Organize lectures, meetings or talkshows according to your needs.
for_bussiness_title: BECOME OUR BUSINESS CUSTOMER TO ENJOY MORE AND MORE OFFERS.
for_bussiness_description: Sign up with us to enjoy our offers now.
space_provider_title: BECOME OUR PARTNER TO BE PART OF THE "WORK ANYWHERE, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT" CULTURE
space_provider_description: Embracing the future of work, WorkNow is a pioneering platform in Vietnam for on-demand workspaces. Help you connect with people who need to find a workspace anywhere, anytime.
working_space_types_description:
Approach unlimited demand, fill your workspaces
and provide services anywhere.
working_room_description: The optimal office solution for businesses.
space_provider_title_1: OPTIMAL WORKPLACE SOLUTIONS FOR EVERY BUSINESS
space_provider_description_1: Provide a variety of workspaces for corporate workforce, business travelers, businessmen and remote workers.
space_provider_pros_1_description: You control the pricing of your space. WorkNow will give you recommendations on how to optimize your revenue.
space_provider_pros_2_description: You control the opening hours, holidays, and temporary closing times of your workspace.
space_provider_pros_3_description: Visualize real-time data, access payments and generate data analytic reports through the WorkNow Space Provider Dashboard.
space_provider_description_3: Get information and billing details of each booking, manage revenue, and define your own reports on revenue, booking by location/ workspace or by time range .
